thread.section_title: NorthShore Care Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of NorthShore Care Supply | www.northshorecare.com
thread.title: Barbara Deibert
thread.title_full: NorthShore Care Supply reviewed by Barbara Deibert

author: Barbara Deibert
title: Barbara Deibert
text: North Shores carries products you can't buy in your drug store. They increase the quality of life. Increases what you are able to do and increase your positive outlook on life. The products are great along with their customer service who can help guide you to the best choice. They are terrific with free samples too. My husband and myself are retired pharmacists. I endure fecal incontinenance with a great deal of pain associated with it. North Shores products has made our lives easier with coverage and allows me some freedom outside our home. They have been wonderful to work with and made a positive difference in my life.
